parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause a complete loss of brakes, leading to accidents or injuries, especially on motorcycles where the rider's safety is heavily dependent on the braking system.
symptoms: The front brake lever becomes hard or unmovable
the rear brake pedal becomes stuck or frozen
the brake pedal has no movement
the ABS system fails to function
the brake system fails to respond
the vehicle is unable to stop or slow down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake switch can cause a fire, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The brake switch starts on fire
the vehicle is unable to start while in gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Observe and Repair Recall
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to observe and repair a recall can lead to accidents, injuries, or damage to the vehicle, and can also result in financial losses for the owner.
symptoms: The dealership fails to observe and repair a recall
the owner is not reimbursed for repairs
the owner is left with a defective vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tread Separation on Kenda Cataclysm Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tread separation on the front tire can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: visible signs of tread separation on the front tire.
